name: Entangled: Get Hands On
description:
Get tangled up in each other! Entangled challenges you and your lover through a steamy game of exploration by inviting you to intertwine yourselves in fun and intimate ways. Continue until you get so twisted together that you can’t hold on any more. Whoever holds on longer wins the round but in the end you both should feel victorious. It’s super sexy fun!

From the makers of Bliss: The Game for Lovers.
